infos.value: It is said that a plethora of treasure lies on each floor and the top of this tower.
And as we speak, innumerable contenders are fighting their way through it, the results of which are rumored to be recorded someplace.
I eagerly await the day your name is listed there as well, Lord Mont.

◆Porcelain Tower◆
Within the Porcelain Tower, you can contend in an all-out battle with every vision you have acquired.
Rewards can be earned for each floor cleared during the <color=#00ffff>duration of the event</color>.

In addition, <color=#00ffff>HP</color>, <color=#00ffff>ability use counts for all abilities</color>, including <color=#00ffff>equipment abilities</color> and <color=#00ffff>evocation magic</color>, and <color=#00ffff>increased Bravery/Faith</color> will be carried over from the end of one battle to the next.

◆Rewards◆
Rewards are earned upon clearing a floor. You can also earn rewards from the second run onwards, though the rewards will differ from your initial run.

◆Rankings◆
Speed Ranking is determined by the speed in which your total number of actions are performed.

You can also compete in the <color=#00ffff>Technical Ranking</color>, which is based on the number of units that are KO'd upon clearing the top floor, for a total of <color=#00ffff>two types of rankings</color>.
